mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_TOKEN (FK_USERID, TOKEN, TOKEN_TYPE, REVOKED, EXPIRED) VALUES (#{fkUserid}, #{token}, #{tokenType}, #{revoked}, #{expired})
mapper.select: SELECT T.FK_USERID, T.TOKEN, T.TOKEN_TYPE, T.REVOKED, T.EXPIRED FROM TBL_TOKEN T INNER JOIN TBL_USER U WHERE U.USERID = #{fkUserid} AND (T.EXPIRED = 'FALSE' OR T.REVOKED = 'FALSE')
SELECT FK_USERID, TOKEN, TOKEN_TYPE, REVOKED, EXPIRED FROM TBL_TOKEN WHERE TOKEN = #{token}
